Reply to:
602 Gladstone
Pullman, WA
99163
Mr. Robert A. Mott, Director
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20036
Dear Bob:
John D. Rockefeller 3rd
Carl E. Sanders My exploration of the Northwestern College Stations
Frank E. Schooley leads me to the conclusion that their headquarters
jack Valenti are in Minneapolis at 50 Willow Street (55403).
Therefore, the listing you have in the copy for
your directory for KNWS-AM-FM showing this address
is incorrect. The zip code for Waterloo, Iowa, is 50702.
In the Broadcasting; Yearbook, I observe that Cornelius
Keur appears to be the official in charge of radio for several
stations which are operated non-commercially for Northwestern.
In addition to KTIS-AM-FM (Minneapolis), KNWC (Sioux
Falls, S. Dakota - CP), and KNWS-AM-FM (Waterloo, Iowa), NorthÂ¬
western was listed in Broadcasting Yearbook as licensee of KFNW-
AM-FM in Fargo, North Dakota. These latter two stations are not
Included in your copy.
Allen Miller
Consultant, Radio Committee
